en.about: Team captain and strategist. She's been playing rugby for 11 years – which means her knees crack, but her spirit never gives up.
en.funFact: When she's not on the field, she dives for peace, hikes to stay fit, digs through rocks like a geologist, and tries to explain to her dog Oggy that weekends aren't always meant for adventures… but he's the only one who can keep up with all her craziness.

hr.about: Kapetanica tima i strateg. Igra ragbi već 11 godina – što znači da joj koljena krckaju, ali duh ne popušta.
hr.funFact: Kad nije na terenu, roni za mirom, planinari radi kondicije, kopa po stijenama kao geolog i pokušava objasniti svom psu Oggyu da vikendi nisu uvijek rezervirani za avanture… ali on je jedini koji može pratiti sve njezine ludosti.

en.about: An islander from Korčula, she's known as the team's main entertainer. She graduated from the stone-carving school on Brač and works in restoration. Her hobbies include photography, video production, cooking, and drawing. Rugby is the perfect sport for her—it has taught her a lot, helped her grow, and she's grateful to be part of this community.
en.quote: Art fills my soul, rugby fills my heart, and the people around me give meaning to everything.
en.funFact: She can do an impressive Donald Duck voice.

hr.about: Otočanka s Korčule, poznata kao glavni zabavljač tima - nadimak 'Živiđuboks'. Zarsila je školu klesarstva na Braču i radi u restauraciji. Hobiji su joj fotografija, video produkcija, kuhanje i crtanje. Ragbi je savršen sport za nju - naučio ju je puno, pomogao joj rasti i zahvalna je što je dio ove zajednice.
hr.quote: Umjetnost ispunjava moju dušu, ragbi moje srce, a ljudi oko mene daju smisao svemu.
hr.funFact: Vrlo realno imitira glas Paje Patka.

en.about: A software engineer and photographer with encyclopedic knowledge of aviation and the British royal family.
en.quote: Everything is possible if you want it enough.
en.funFact: She photographed king Charles III and queen Camilla.

hr.about: Programerka i fotografkinja s enciklopedijskim znanjem o zrakoplovstvu i britanskoj kraljevskoj obitelji.
hr.quote: Sve je moguće ako to dovoljno želiš.
hr.funFact: Fotografirala je kralja Charlesa III. i kraljicu Camillu.

en.quote: Each pass carries more than a ball - it carries trust, courage, and the will to move forward.
en.funFact: She comes from France, a land where rugby runs deep, but it was in Croatia that she first laced up her cleats.

hr.quote: Svako dodavanje nosi više od lopte - nosi povjerenje, hrabrost i volju za naprijed.
hr.funFact: Dolazi iz Francuske, zemlje gdje je ragbi duboko ukorijenjen, ali je u Hrvatskoj prvi put obula kopačke.

en.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
en.funFact: Never missed a lineout throw in her two years with the team!

hr.funFact: Nikad nije promašila bacanje u aut tijekom svoje dvije godine s timom!

en.about: Former gymnast who brings exceptional body control and agility to the game.
en.quote: Attack wins games, but defense wins championships.
en.funFact: Has an intense love for gummy bears and a reputation for getting mad easily - but her passion makes her the fierce competitor she is on the field!

hr.about: Bivša gimnastičarka koja donosi izuzetnu kontrolu tijela i agilnost u igru.
hr.quote: Napad osvaja utakmice, ali obrana osvaja prvenstva.
hr.funFact: Voli gumene bombone vise od svog brata. Lako se naljuti.

en.about: Barber with a heart of gold and a smile that will light up your day.
en.quote: Nothing in life has happened by accident.
en.funFact: She keeps saying she doesn't feel like doing anything, yet she still gets everything done.

hr.quote: Ništa u životu se nije dogodilo slučajno.
hr.funFact: Stalno govori da joj se ništa ne da, a opet sve obavi.

en.quote: Rugby taught me more about life than school ever could.
en.funFact: Before rugby, she trained kickboxing, and in her free time, she goes on adventures with her dogs.

hr.quote: Ragbi me naučio više o životu nego škola ikad.
hr.funFact: Prije ragbija trenirala je kickboxing, a u slobodno vrijeme ide u avanture sa svojim psima.

en.about: Gabi, a primary school student who loves playing rugby. Kind, wise, and strong.
en.quote: Life without rugby would be like life without food and water.
en.funFact: Very shy until you get to know her.

hr.about: Gabi, učenica osnovne škole koja voli igrati ragbi. Dobra, mudra i snažna.
hr.quote: Život bez ragbija bio bi kao život bez hrane i vode.
hr.funFact: Vrlo sramežljiva dok je ne upoznaš.

en.about: Lightning-fast finisher with safe hands under pressure. Scores tries that seem impossible.
en.quote: Speed gets you there, but composure gets you over the line.
en.funFact: Former gymnast whose flexibility allows her to score tries from impossible angles!

hr.about: Munjevito brza finišerica sa sigurnim rukama pod pritiskom. Postiže pokušaje koji izgledaju nemogući.
hr.quote: Brzina te dovodi tamo, ali prisebnost te prebacuje liniju.
hr.funFact: Bivša gimnastičarka čija joj fleksibilnost omogućuje postizanje pokušaja iz nemogućih kutova!

en.about: Lightning-fast finisher with safe hands under pressure. Scores tries that seem impossible.
en.quote: Speed gets you there, but composure gets you over the line.
en.funFact: Former gymnast whose flexibility allows her to score tries from impossible angles!

hr.about: Munjevito brza finišerica sa sigurnim rukama pod pritiskom. Postiže pokušaje koji izgledaju nemogući.
hr.quote: Brzina te dovodi tamo, ali prisebnost te prebacuje liniju.
hr.funFact: Bivša gimnastičarka čija joj fleksibilnost omogućuje postizanje pokušaja iz nemogućih kutova!

en.about: Back row powerhouse with leadership qualities and an engine that never stops.
en.quote: Lead from the front, support from behind, never give up.
en.funFact: Runs 10km every morning before training - her fitness is legendary!

hr.about: Snaga zadnjeg reda s vodstvenim kvalitetama i motorom koji nikad ne prestaje.
hr.quote: Vodi s prednje strane, podržavaj s leđa, nikad ne odustaj.
hr.funFact: Trči 10km svako jutro prije treninga - njena kondicija je legendarna!

en.about: Solid scrummager with powerful driving game in open play.
en.quote: Scrums are won with heart, not just muscle.
en.funFact: Former powerlifter who brings incredible strength to the scrum.

hr.about: Čvrsta u škorpijama s moćnom igrom u otvorenom prostoru.
hr.quote: Škorpije se osvajaju srcem, ne samo mišićima.
hr.funFact: Bivša powerlifterica koja donosi nevjerojatnu snagu u škorpije.

en.about: Explosive winger with great footwork and finishing ability.
en.quote: Every time I touch the ball, I'm looking for the try line.
en.funFact: Scored a hat-trick in her debut match!

hr.about: Eksplozivno krilo s odličnom tehnikom stopala i sposobnošću finaliziranja.
hr.quote: Svaki put kad dodirnem loptu, gledam liniju pokušaja.
hr.funFact: Postigla hat-trick na svom debitantskom meču!

en.about: Not the fastest, but also not the strongest, good at injuring teammates
en.quote: I'm here for a good time, but also for a bad time. Actually, any kind of time because it is always fun.
en.funFact: Can do at least one (1) push up.

hr.about: Nije najbrža, ali ni najjača, dobra u ozljeđivanju suigračica.
hr.quote: Ovdje sam za dobro vrijeme, ali i za loše vrijeme. Zapravo, za bilo kakvo vrijeme jer je uvijek zabavno.

en.about: Precision thrower and fierce competitor who leads the front row with passion.
en.quote: Accuracy under pressure is what separates good players from great ones.
en.funFact: Has a 95% lineout throwing accuracy - the highest in the league!

hr.about: Precizna bacačica i žestoka natjecateljica koja vodi prvu liniju sa strašću.
hr.quote: Preciznost pod pritiskom je ono što razlikuje dobre igračice od izvrsnih.
hr.funFact: Ima 95% preciznosti bacanja u aut - najvišu u ligi!

en.about: Versatile forward who brings energy and intensity to every breakdown.
en.quote: Winning starts with attitude and ends with effort.
en.funFact: Former basketball player who brings exceptional athleticism to rugby.

hr.about: Svestrana napadačica koja donosi energiju i intenzitet na svaku situaciju.
hr.quote: Pobjeda počinje s stavom i završava s naporom.
hr.funFact: Bivša košarkašica koja donosi iznimnu atletičnost u ragbi.
